content:
```
Define the module TopModule with inputs a, b, c, d, e (each 4 bits) and output q (4 bits).

Retrieved Related Information:
a: 4-bit input signal
b: 4-bit input signal
c: 4-bit input signal
d: 4-bit input signal
e: 4-bit input signal
q: 4-bit output signal
At 25ns, when c is 2, q is assigned the value of a
At 15ns, when c is 0, q is assigned the value of b
At 20ns, when c is 1, q is assigned the value of e
At 30ns, when c is 3, q is assigned the value of d
At 35ns to 90ns, when c is 4 to f, q is assigned the value of f
time  a  b  c  d  e  q
```
source: I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified. - input  a (4 bits) - input  b (4 bits) - input  c (4 bits) - input  d (4 bits) - input  e (4 bits) - output q (4 bits)

content:
```
Implement the combinational logic for output q based on the value of input c. Use the provided waveform to determine the logic.

Retrieved Related Information:
c: 4-bit input signal
q: 4-bit output signal
At 15ns, when c is 0, q is assigned the value of b
At 20ns, when c is 1, q is assigned the value of e
At 25ns, when c is 2, q is assigned the value of a
At 30ns, when c is 3, q is assigned the value of d
At 35ns to 90ns, when c is 4 to f, q is assigned the value of f
time  a  b  c  d  e  q
```
source: The module should implement a combinational circuit. Read the simulation waveforms to determine what the circuit does, then implement it. time  a  b  c  d  e  q 0ns   x  x  x  x  x  x 5ns   x  x  x  x  x  x 10ns  x  x  x  x  x  x 15ns  a  b  0  d  e  b 20ns  a  b  1  d  e  e 25ns  a  b  2  d  e  a 30ns  a  b  3  d  e  d 35ns  a  b  4  d  e  f 40ns  a  b  5  d  e  f 45ns  a  b  6  d  e  f 50ns  a  b  7  d  e  f 55ns  a  b  8  d  e  f 60ns  a  b  9  d  e  f 65ns  a  b  a  d  e  f 70ns  a  b  b  d  e  f 75ns  a  b  c  d  e  f 80ns  a  b  d  d  e  f 85ns  a  b  e  d  e  f 90ns  a  b  f  d  e  f
